namespaces.namespace: Wiki on Intel Atom laptop talk

revision.text:
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2015|Number=4|Part=i|Marks=4}}
Forward value is present value accumulated = $$9.0161 * 1.05^{(9/12)} = 9.352.$$
Present value is 9.0161.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>10</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.08333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-50</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.58333</effective_time><cashflow_value>-50</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.05</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=5|Marks=7|Oracle=2128.77|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_interest</request><m>1</m><source_m>2</source_m><source_rate>0.06</source_rate><i_effective/></parameters></fin-math>
Present value = 1047.22. Accumulated value = present value * 1.0609^12 = 1047.22 * 1.0609^12 = 2128.78.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>4</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>4</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>12</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>4</term><value>4</value><rate_per_year>120</rate_per_year><effective_time>8</effective_time><cashflow_value>480</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.0609</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

revision.text:
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=7|Part=iii|Marks=2|Oracle=16.3%|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
<fin-math><parameters><CT1_Spot_Rates><item0><delta>0.067658648473815</delta><effective_time>3.5</effective_time></item0><item1><delta>0.086177696241052</delta><effective_time>4.5</effective_time></item1></CT1_Spot_Rates><request>explain_forward</request><forward_start_time>3.5</forward_start_time><forward_end_time>4.5</forward_end_time></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=9|Marks=9|Oracle=6.84% escalation per year|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
Verification of examiner solution of 6.84% escalation per year.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>4000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>4000000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>900000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.5</effective_time><cashflow_value>850420.06427076</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.113328685307</delta><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-6800000</rate_per_year><effective_time>6</effective_time><cashflow_value>-3445091.6240058</cashflow_value></item2><item3><m>4</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>5</term><value>5.75073901</value><escalation_delta>0.067658648473815</escalation_delta><escalation_rate_effective>0.0683544</escalation_rate_effective><escalation_frequency>1</escalation_frequency><rate_per_year>-360000</rate_per_year><effective_time>1</effective_time><cashflow_value>-2070266.0436</cashflow_value></item3></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
===Derivation of escalation rate (as in examiner report)===
Present value of net outgo excluding rental income is 1,405,328.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>4000000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>4000000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>900000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0.5</effective_time><cashflow_value>900000</cashflow_value></item1><item2><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>-6800000</rate_per_year><effective_time>6</effective_time><cashflow_value>-6800000</cashflow_value></item2></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.12</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
So present value of rental income is \begin{align} 1,405,328 & = 360,000 v \ddot{a}^{(4)}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{1}}} \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j \\ & = 360000 / 1.12 * 0.95887302 \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j \\ \Rightarrow \ddot{a}_{ \require{enclose}{\enclose{actuarial}{5}}} @j & = 1,405,328 \times 1.12 / (360000 * 0.95887302) \\ & = 4.559656. \end{align}
(By interpolation), required net rate j is 4.834128% per year
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_escalating</request><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><i_effective/><term>5</term><value>4.559656</value><escalation_rate_effective/><escalation_frequency/></parameters></fin-math>
So escalation rate is 1.12 / 1.04834128 -1 = 6.83544% per year.

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=11|Part=ii|Marks=4|Oracle=26.62|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Exam question}}
Interest rate of 15% convertible monthly is interest rate of 15%/12 = 1.25% per month.
Increasing annuity paying 1, 2 .. 60 has present value 1126.9 and 26.62 * 1126.9 = 29,998.
<fin-math><parameters><request>get_annuity_increasing</request><m>1</m><i_effective>0.0125</i_effective><term>60</term><value/><increasing>1</increasing></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 A2015|Number=11|Part=iii|Marks=5|Oracle=12.8%|Oracle-source=CT1 A2015 Examiner's report}}
APR is 12.76% rounded up to 1dp = 12.8%. Amount repaid per year = 958.32 * 12 = 11,499.84.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>30000</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>30000</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>12</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>5</term><value>5</value><rate_per_year>-11499.84</rate_per_year><effective_time>3</effective_time><cashflow_value>4791.6</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><value>0</value></parameters></fin-math>

{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2014|Number=6|Part=i|Marks=2|Oracle=100|Oracle-source=CT1 S2014 Exam question}}
Net running yield = net redemption yield, so price is at par.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.039220713153281</delta><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>10</term><value>8.110895779355</value><rate_per_year>400</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>3244.358311742</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.039220713153281</delta><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>10000</rate_per_year><effective_time>10</effective_time><cashflow_value>6755.641688258</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
{{Exam-question|Exam Code=CT1 S2014|Number=6|Part=ii|Marks=3|Oracle=8.19 years|Oracle-source=CT1 S2014 Exam question}}
885.53 / 108.11 = 8.191.
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.039220713153281</delta><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>1000</rate_per_year><effective_time>10</effective_time><cashflow_value>6755.641688258</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>10</term><value></value><increasing>1</increasing><rate_per_year>5</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>22000</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>
<fin-math><parameters><request>value_cashflows</request><CT1_Cashflows><item0><m>1</m><advance>1</advance><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0.039220713153281</delta><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><term>1</term><value>1</value><rate_per_year>100</rate_per_year><effective_time>10</effective_time><cashflow_value>6755.641688258</cashflow_value></item0><item1><m>1</m><advance/><source_rate/><source_format/><delta>0</delta><i_effective>0</i_effective><term>10</term><value></value><rate_per_year>5</rate_per_year><effective_time>0</effective_time><cashflow_value>22000</cashflow_value></item1></CT1_Cashflows><i_effective>0.04</i_effective><value/></parameters></fin-math>

revision.text:
This is the "Exam-question" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Exam-question
|Exam Code=
|Number=
|Part=
|Marks=
|Oracle=
|Oracle-source=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. =={{{Number|}}}.{{{Part|}}} ({{{Marks|}}} mark{{plural|{{{Marks|}}}}})== {{#set_internal:is_part_of_question |In exam={{{Exam Code|}}} |Has number={{{Number|}}} |Has part={{{Part|}}} |Has marks={{{Marks|}}} }} [[Category:Exam-question]] {{#set:In exam={{{Exam Code|}}}}} {{#if:{{{Oracle-source|}}}|{{#if:{{{Oracle|}}}|{{display-solution|{{{Oracle|}}}|{{{Oracle-source|}}}}}|}}|}}

This is the "Plural" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Plural
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifexpr:{{{1|}}}>1|s|}}
Solution: {{{1|}}}{{#tag:ref| {{{2|}}} }}

This is the "Exam" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Exam
|Examiner=
|Title=
|Date=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {| class="wikitable" ! Title | [[Has title::{{{Title|}}}]] |- ! Date | [[Has date::{{{Date|}}}]] |- ! Examiner | [[Has examiner::{{{Examiner|}}}]] |} {{Question-types |Exam={{PAGENAME}} }} {{#ask:[[is_part_of_question::+]][[In exam::{{PAGENAME}}]] |?Has number |?Has part |?Has marks |sort=Has number,Has part |order=ascending,ascending |mainlabel=Question}} [[Category:Exam]]

{{Question-types
|Exam=
}}
